author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Dependabot couldn't reach https://www.powershellgallery.com/api/v2/ as it timed out.

Is https://www.powershellgallery.com/api/v2/ accessible over the internet? If it is then this may be a transitory issue and can be ignored - Dependabot will close it on its next successful update run.

You can mention @dependabot in the comments below to contact the Dependabot team.

comments.author: iscalvaro1990
comments.body: I have the  same problem when i try  to get some (Microsoft) libraries.

comments.author: danielboth
comments.body: Yes, it seems to be offline, see here: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGallery/blob/master/psgallery_status.md

title: Dependabot couldn't reach https://www.powershellgallery.com/api/v2/ as it timed out
